sha්ri lankawa surya balashakthiya sandaha sudusu ratak wana athara jiwa wayuwa menma sulan balaya da merata wikalpa balashakthi athara pa්ramukha thanak ganiyi.me wanawita jalawiduliyen balashakthiya uthpadanaya kirima itha sarthakawa ka්riyathmaka wana athara wikalpa balashakthi pa්rabhawayan pilibandawa rajaye awadhanaya yomuwa thibe.merata dinen dina wadiwana balashakthi illumata awashya wana balashakthi sapayuma sandaha nawa wikalpa balashakthi pa්rabhawayan handunaganima me athara pa්ramukha weyi.

pitastharaya 2 pennala dila thiyana widihata me widihata simawak nathi balayak ekka rajya yanthranaya athata ahuwunama eeka nawatha mudaganna eka pahasu naha.agamathi aandu thiyena ratawala mathiwarana pawathwanne bharakara aandu yatathe.adhika widhayaka balayak thamange athe thiyagena janadhipathi widihata ekkenek tharaga karaddi aneth apekshakayanta ithama asadharana widihata pitiya hadena hati gana amuthuwen kiyanna oone naha.80 gananwala thamanta oone oone widihata jeaar kriyakala andamayi me hasirimayi athara wenasak aththatama naha.parlimenthu chande 83 nothiya janamatha wicharanayak thiyala thamange adhika balathala athule eeka awashya widihata meheyawala dinana gaman jeaar ratata kiwweth - janamatha wicharane kiyanne janatha kamaththane.ithin janaya anumatha koranawa nam chande nothibbaya kiyana eke waradda mokakda kiyana eka.
thamange aadhyathmaya thulinma, thaman kerenma mathuwana kilitiwu kamaththa, wichikichchawa thamanma iwath kara ganima hara wenath kenekuta apa wenuwen meya karadiya nohakiyi.

me sadaha amarapura shi්ra dharmarakshitha nikaye abhinawa mahanayaka thirikunamale aananda mahanahimiyan pirisa panchasilayehi pihituwimen anathuruwa ,bodubala sena pa්radhani kirama wimalajothi himi ,nawinne sugunadhamma himi ,hagoda wipassi himiwarun pa්radhana maha sangha rathnayeth samastha lanka bauddha maha sammelanaye sabhapathi jagath sumathipala ,acharya pa්rananith abesundara ,mahacharya sirimal ranawalla mahathwarun athulu gihi pa්rabhun diwayine bodu sanwidhana, rajya aayathana samajika samajikawan rasakage sahabhagithwayen.

idam - polis - saukhya - adhyapana sampath menma swayan palanayak tienee illayi "fedaral kramaya yatathe uthura saha nagenahira eekabaddhath kala yuthuyi" kirthi warnakulasuriya idam, polis, saukhya, adhyapana, sampath saha mulya balathala menma swayan palanayada awashya yayi drawida jathika sandhanaya (tienee) uthuru palath sabha mathiwarana prakashanaya elidakwamin sandahan kara atha.
raktharshaswaladi yoga wanuye rakthapiththa chikithsawayi.

pashchath wikata rangana hama ekakma mema khedawachakaye barapathalakama hethu kotagena pana naguna eewa ya. 1975 di shri lanka nidahas pakshaya samaga sabhagaya awasan kala da hawul aandu deshapalanayen bidimata sampradayayika wame pakshawalata nohaki wiya. 1994 di sampradayayika wame paksha dekama nawatha wathawak shri lanka nidahas pakshaya samaga sabhagakata athul wiya. 2014 di eyinuth obbata gos sampradayayika wame paksha dekema kotas eksath jathika pakshaya samaga da hawulakata gaman gaththe ya.
